files.description: Documents deterministic artifact rules for the /outputs directory including naming conventions, JSON schemas, overwrite policy, and required per-run files.
Implements a deterministic CLI pipeline that always writes outputs/run_stamp.json, outputs/run.log, outputs/results.json, and outputs/figure.png on every run with a consistent overwrite policy.
Provides the core deterministic computation and artifact-writing functions used by the CLI pipeline implementation.
Defines artifact schemas, validation, and deterministic serialization utilities for run_stamp.json, results.json, and run.log generation.
Generates figure.png deterministically (fixed size, style, seed, and metadata handling) from computed results.
Declares Python project metadata, dependencies, and tool configuration required to run the pipeline and tests in CI.
Pins runtime dependencies to ensure reproducible installs for local runs and CI/CD execution.
Pins development and test dependencies used by CI/CD for linting and automated verification of artifacts.
Automated tests that execute the pipeline and assert the presence, determinism, and schema validity of run_stamp.json, run.log, results.json, and figure.png.
CI/CD workflow that installs dependencies, runs tests, executes the pipeline, and verifies required /outputs artifacts are produced on every run.

missionDescription: Create /outputs/README.md documenting artifact rules (naming, schemas, determinism, overwrite policy) and ensure the pipeline generates run_stamp.json + run.log + results.json + figure.png on every run.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
